title: Authors and Citation
text: Keskintürk T, Vaisey S (2024). gridsearch: Performs Grid Search Individual Change Panel Data. R package version 0.1.0, https://tkeskinturk.github.io/gridsearch/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {gridsearch: Performs Grid Search for Individual Change in Panel Data},   author = {Turgut Keskintürk and Stephen Vaisey},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://tkeskinturk.github.io/gridsearch/}, }

what: Performs Grid Search for Individual Change in Panel Data
title: Performs Grid Search for Individual Change in Panel Data
text: gridsearch R package used adjudicating plausible data generation processes (DGP) given panel dataset. current version, gridsearch allows researchers : Generate simulated datasets given set DGP parameters, Implement simple grid-search algorithm see plausible combinations parameter values may approximate observed marginal distributions, Plot resultant error distributions grid-search algorithm, Generate simple simulations calculating classification accuracy measures see whether, given DGP, can identify changing units certain level accuracy. package companion article, Promises Pitfalls Using Panel Data Understand Individual Belief Change, stored SocArXiv.

title: Performs Grid Search for Individual Change in Panel Data
text: can install development version gridsearch Github :

what: Build Panel Data from a DGP — buildDGP
title: Build Panel Data from a DGP — buildDGP
text: function (1) builds simulated dataset using parameters supplied function call, (2) generates distinct outcome patterns concatenating outcomes across time periods individual provides counts pattern, (3) calculates slope coefficients change individual level.

title: Build Panel Data from a DGP — buildDGP
code: buildDGP(   n = 1000,   t = 3,   rate = 0.25,   balance_dir = 0.5,   balance_res = 0.5,   strength = 1,   reliable = 0.8,   export = TRUE,   patterns = FALSE,   slopes = FALSE )

title: Build Panel Data from a DGP — buildDGP
text: n number units DGP. t number time periods. rate percent units changing across panel. balance_dir direction change, 0 codes negative change, 1 codes positive change, values -codes percentage changers changing positive direction. balance_res marginal distribution outcome (effectively regulating percent distribution 0s 1s). strength strength change latent variable. reliable reliability score outcome measurement. export export = TRUE, function exports simulated dataset. patterns patterns = TRUE, function exports concatenated panel patterns. slopes slopes = TRUE, function exports slope coefficients.

title: Build Panel Data from a DGP — buildDGP
Build Panel Data from a DGP — buildDGP
text: Basic buildDGP() call:   Basic buildDGP() call patterns :
code: set.seed(11235) data <- buildDGP(n = 2,                  t = 3,                  rate = 0.5,                  balance_dir = 0.5,                  balance_res = 0.5,                  strength = 1,                  reliable = 0.9,                  export = TRUE,                  patterns = FALSE,                  slopes = FALSE) print(data) #> # A tibble: 6 x 6 #>     pid changer timing     t y_true y_obs #>   <int>   <int>  <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> #> 1     1       0    0     0   -0.297     1 #> 2     1       0    0     0.5 -0.297     1 #> 3     1       0    0     1   -0.297     1 #> 4     2       1    0.5   0   -1.42      0 #> 5     2       1    0.5   0.5 -2.42      0 #> 6     2       1    0.5   1   -2.42      0 set.seed(11235) data <- buildDGP(n = 100,                  t = 3,                  rate = 0.5,                  balance_dir = 0.5,                  balance_res = 0.5,                  strength = 1,                  reliable = 0.9,                  export = FALSE,                  patterns = TRUE,                  slopes = FALSE) print(data) #> # A tibble: 8 x 2 #>   patterns     n #>   <chr>    <int> #> 1 000         35 #> 2 001          6 #> 3 010          3 #> 4 011          2 #> 5 100          7 #> 6 101          5 #> 7 110          6 #> 8 111         36

title: Plot Grid — gridPlot
text: function plots distribution error scores resulting gridSearch.

title: Plot Grid — gridPlot
code: gridPlot(   data,   method = c("quantile", "normalized"),   qcut1 = 0.05,   qcut2 = 0.1,   qcut3 = 0.2,   ncut1 = 0.05,   ncut2 = 0.1,   ncut3 = 0.2 )

title: Plot Grid — gridPlot
text: data data frame generated gridSearch method method = quantile, cuts based quantile error distribution. method = normalized, cuts based normalized error scores (error / n), ranges 0 2, pattern = contingency, normalized KS statistics, ranges 0 1, pattern = slopes. qcut1 Cut 1 quantile method. qcut2 Cut 2 quantile method. qcut3 Cut 3 quantile method. ncut1 Cut 1 normalized method. ncut2 Cut 2 normalized method. ncut3 Cut 3 normalized method.

title: Grid Search — gridSearch
text: function uses three-step grid search algorithm calculate extent dataframe can approximated known DGP.

title: Grid Search — gridSearch
code: gridSearch(   data,   yname,   tname,   pname,   pattern = c("contingency", "slopes"),   step1 = 1,   step2 = 30,   step3 = 500,   reliability = 0.9,   seed = 11235,   workers = 8 )

title: Grid Search — gridSearch
text: data dataframe. yname outcome identifier. tname time identifier. pname unit identifier. pattern pattern = contingency, calculations based use contingency table panel patterns; pattern = slopes, calculations based individual slope coefficients across time. step1 number simulated datasets Step 1. step2 number simulated datasets Step 2. step3 number simulated datasets Step 3. reliability reliability score outcome measurement. seed Set seed. workers number workers parallelization.

title: Simulate Changers — simulateChangers
text: function gets several DGP parameters calculates kappa, sensitivity, specificity scores classifying individual changers simulated data frames.

title: Simulate Changers — simulateChangers
code: simulateChangers(   n = 1000,   t = 3,   rate = 0.25,   balance_dir = 0.5,   balance_res = 0.5,   strength = 1,   reliable = 0.8,   nrep = 1000,   seed = 11235,   workers = 8 )

title: Simulate Changers — simulateChangers
text: n number units DGP. t number time periods. rate percent units changing across panel period. balance_dir direction change, 0 codes negative change, 1 codes positive change, values -codes percentage changers changing positive direction. balance_res marginal distribution outcome (effectively indexing 0-1 cut latent variable). strength strength change latent variable. reliable reliability score outcome measurement. nrep number simulation runs. seed Set seed. workers number workers parallelization.
